name: deep-sea-tooth
effect: Held by Clamperl: Doubles the holder’s Special Attack. Evolves the holder into Huntail when traded.
short_effect: Doubles Clamperl’s Special Attack. Traded on a Clamperl: Holder evolves into Huntail.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: An item to be held by CLAMPERL. A fang that gleams a sharp silver, it raises the Sp. Atk stat.
flavor_text.platinum: An item to be held by CLAMPERL. A fang that gleams a sharp silver, it raises the Sp. Atk stat.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: An item to be held by CLAMPERL. A fang that gleams a sharp silver, it raises the Sp. Atk stat.
